Articles.Content: is there a way to use internal Cockpit view with the new capsule?.If so How

THAT IS EXACTLY WHAT I WANT TO KNOW!!! (sorry for spammin Caps :/ )

I thought it was a feature in 0.16 to get the internal views... Cant seem to find a way :/
Well, your first step would have been to check the changelog, which, if I remember correctly, doesn\'t include the IVA bits.
IVA actions are not included in version 0.16 because they aren\'t done yet. maybe we will see some IVAs in future versions

I seems like they are not included yet, though they were listed as 'likely' on the planned features list for 0.16. I guess they are now due for one of the next releases since as far as i can see from C7s Blog the cockpits have already made a lot of progress.

But there is still something i don\'t understand: The changelog for the first 0.16 experimental release states ->' * New Internal Cockpit models, with full modding support. '

Are those 'new models' just background models for the crew screens that can be seen on the bottom right during flight?

Also, I just checked out the game folders and there are some new things like a folder structure that contains 'internal' models and 'cockpit' files for the mk1 capsule.

Judging from the size of the files i guess there are already complete internal cockpits included in the 0.16 release, but where are they in the game?

I guess putting them in would be pointless because the instruments and controls in them arenâ€™t done yet.

They\'re supposed to be fully interactive cockpit interiors, flight-simulator-stile, eventually anyway.

But there is still something i don\'t understand: The changelog for the first 0.16 experimental release states ->' * New Internal Cockpit models, with full modding support. '

Note the word experimental. It\'s quite possible internal views were completed enough for the testing and experimenters to give them a whirl, but were found to be not up to par with the rest of what was projected to be included in 0.16, and therefore not included. I would say that there is definite good odds that the next update will include them.
